Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.20 Hetuduka, Ajjhattattika » 1.20.2 Bahiddhāpada » 1.20.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Ajjhattattika
Bahiddhāpada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
523.
1175Hetu bahiddhā dhammo hetussa bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
524.
1176Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1177Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1178Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1179(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ. Ajjhattabahiddhā na labbhanti.)
1180Hetudukaajjhattattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Hetvādiup1.21 Hetuduka, Ajjhattārammaṇattika >>
